# **Data preparation**

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
library(massdataset)
library(tidyverse)
library(massstat)
data("liver_aging_pos")
liver_aging_pos
```

# **Distance**

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
x <- 
  liver_aging_pos %>% 
  `+`(1) %>% 
  log(10) %>% 
  scale_data(method = "auto")
```

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
liver_aging_pos[1,] %>% 
  scale_data(center = TRUE, method = "auto") %>% 
  extract_expression_data() %>% 
  as.numeric() %>% 
  density() %>% 
  plot()
```

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
liver_aging_pos[1,] %>% 
  scale_data(center = TRUE, method = "range") %>% 
  extract_expression_data() %>% 
  as.numeric() %>% 
  density() %>% 
  plot()
```

```{r,eval=TRUE,warning=FALSE, R.options="", message=FALSE, cache=TRUE}
liver_aging_pos[1,] %>% 
  scale_data(center = TRUE, method = "pareto") %>% 
  extract_expression_data() %>% 
  as.numeric() %>% 
  density() %>% 
  plot()
```
